item.title: PACE-ITN (2015--2019)
item.description: The PACE ITN project involves over 50 researchers spread across 10 full and 5 associated partners, from academia and the private sector, established in 7 different European and Associated countries, the PACE network gathers a broad range of expertise from experimental psychology, cognitive neurosciences, brain imaging, technology and clinical sciences. The PACE Project has received funding from the European Unionâ€™s Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme under the Marie Sklodowska-Curie grant agreement No 642961
